comment: "Space has been around dozens of years yet we know almost nothing about it." -- Black Science Man from "12 Years an Afronaut" "1st Kang" & "1st Kang II: Trannies in Space"

            :ARG1 (k / know-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (n / nothing
                        :mod (a / almost))
                  :topic (s / space))
            :ARG2 (e / exist-01
                  :ARG1 (s2 / space)
                  :duration (a2 / around
                        :op1 (m2 / multiple
                              :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 12
                                    :unit (y / year))))))
      :snt2 (m3 / man
            :mod (s3 / science)
            :ARG1-of (b / black-05)
            :source (a3 / and
                  :op1 (p / publication
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "12"
                              :op2 "Years"
                              :op3 "An"
                              :op4 "Afronaut"))
                  :op2 (p2 / publication
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "First"
                              :op2 "Kang"
                              :op3 "II"))
                  :op3 (p3 / publication
                        :name (n4 / name

                              :op2 "Kang"
                              :op3 "II:")))))
